title: Consent to the processing of personal data
text1: In accordance with the wording of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of April 27, 2016 on the protection of natural persons in connection with the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data and on the repeal of Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) I grant
text2: Masaryk University, Žerotínovo nám. 617/9, 601 77 Brno, as the administrator of personal data, for a period of five years, consent to the processing of personal data to the extent of:
text3: first name, last name, date of birth, e-mail address and telephone number
text4: for the purpose of sending the measured data electronically.
list: I understand that according to the General Data Protection Regulation I have the right to:
listItem1: revoke the consent given at any time, without being threatened with any sanction, by sending an e-mail to the electronic address
listItem2: request information from the administrator about what kind of personal data it processes and request a copy of this data,
listItem3: request access to this data from the administrator, have it updated or corrected, or request restriction of processing,
listItem4: request the deletion of processed personal data from the administrator,
